Authors & Citation
==================

pymycar is an open-source project supported by a community of contributors. While many contributors are listed in the :ref:`authors` section, we encourage you to explore our `Contributors Graph`_ for a comprehensive view.


.. _Contributors Graph: https://github.com/CastillonMiguel/pymycar/network/dependencies
